title: Happy New Year for Airlines, Success with Small Caps, Amazon Dominance
itunes:title: Happy New Year for Airlines, Success with Small Caps, Amazon Dominance
description:
Savi Syth, Senior VP of Equity Research at Raymond James, talks airline outlook in 2018. Bryant Riley, Chairman at B. Riley Financial, discusses raising equity and debt for small cap companies. Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson has his "Chart of the Day." Jitendra Waral, Bloomberg Intelligence Analyst, sees Amazon on track to surpass $1 trillion in gross sales by 2025. We Drive to the Close with Tony Roth, Chief Investment Officer at Wilmington Trust. And Carol and Cory hit today’s Movers and Shakers on Wall Street, and Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson has his “Stock of the Day.”

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Savi Syth, Senior VP of Equity Research at Raymond James, talks airline outlook in 2018. Bryant Riley, Chairman at B. Riley Financial, discusses raising equity and debt for small cap companies. We Drive to the Close with Tony Roth, Chief Investment Officer at Wilmington Trust. And Carol and Cory hit today’s Movers and Shakers on Wall Street, and Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson has his “Stock of the Day.”

itunes:author: Bloomberg
